attributes.action: Get BT to finally upgrade the Broadband in Dawlish Warren as it is unusable.
attributes.additional_details:
As the Dawlish Chamber of Trade and Commerce Chairman, I constantly hear if anything is going to be done about the abysmal speed that BT seem to think is acceptable.  

I also run a business running live webcams along the South Devon coast. I run my cameras in Dawlish at 5000 kbps and can barely run the in Dawlish Warren at 100 kbps.

This has been a topic of frustration for many years in Dawlish Warren while every other area surrounding seems to be on super fast fibre.
attributes.background:
I have been talking with local residents, business owners and holiday makers over the past 4 years about the BT network in Dawlish Warren that is unfit for purpose.

The internet is so slow in Dawlish Warren but neighbouring Dawlish has ultra fast fibre.
